stimulusHtml: Which of the following replacements for /* missing initialization */ will cause the code segment to print the value 3?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

int[][] arr2D = /* missing initialization */;
int sum = 0;

for (int j = 0; j < arr2D.length; j++)
{
   sum += arr2D[j][2];
}

System.out.println(sum);
